verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Hallelujah Jesus is alive Death has lost its victory And the grave has been denied. Jesus lives forever He’s alive, He’s alive.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}And we have perfect liberty The Lamb of God is risen He’s alive, He’s alive Hallelujah Jesus is alive.{/lang-eng}
